events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position online, including their resume and portfolio links.
The recruiting team reviewed the application and categorized it under the engineering department for the software developer role.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process moving forward.
The recruiter conducted an initial phone screening and the candidate demonstrated a strong understanding of devops and software development.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback, expressing enthusiasm to proceed to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the senior engineering team for next Monday morning.
